This vignette utilises the Snowflake ODBC connector, the AzureAuth package for Azure authentication and the DBI package to run queries on the connected database. These functions provide useful tools to easily connect to the Snowflake data warehouse, run SnowSQL queries and ingest data from R to snowflake.
